inventory.name: Dagger
inventory.description: A small, sharp blade, ideal for quick strikes or throwing.

spells.name: Blinding Light
spells.description: You conjure a burst of radiant light, temporarily blinding a creature.

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.description: You attempt to charm a humanoid, making them regard you as a friendly acquaintance.

spells.name: Thunderclap
spells.description: You create a burst of thunderous sound, damaging and deafening nearby creatures.

spells.name: Cause Fear
spells.description: You instill overwhelming fear in a creature, causing them to flee or cower.

spells.name: Grasping Vines
spells.description: Magical vines sprout from the ground, entangling a creature.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: You paralyze a humanoid, rendering them unable to move or act.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends or they attack.

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.description: You paralyze a creature, regardless of type, rendering them immobile.

spells.name: Flesh to Stone
spells.description: You attempt to turn a creature to stone, petrifying them over time.

spells.name: Poison Spray
spells.description: You extend your hand and project a puff of noxious gas at a creature.

spells.name: Earth Tremor
spells.description: You cause a tremor in the ground, knocking creatures prone and dealing damage.

spells.name: Entangle
spells.description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout, restraining creatures in an area.

spells.name: Stunning Strike
spells.description: You strike a creature with force, attempting to stun them momentarily.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description: You send creatures into a magical slumber, rendering them unconscious.
